thread.title: Saudi Aramco's IPO is likely delayed until 2019

title: Saudi Aramco's IPO is likely delayed until 2019
text:
Saudi Aramco's IPO is likely delayed until 2019 Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:08 
British officials have reportedly been informed by their Saudi counterparts that oil giant Saudi Aramco's initial public offering is likely to be delayed until 2019. Sarah Charlton reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British officials have reportedly been informed by their Saudi counterparts that oil giant Saudi Aramco's initial public offering is likely to be delayed until 2019. Sarah Charlton reports.
